name: Crescendo Music Notation File
summary: Learn about .CDO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: CDO files can be exported to .MID files in the Crescendo software.

description: Music file created by Crescendo Music Notation Editor, a program used for writing musical scores; includes the meter, musical notes, and page layout information for the sheet music; used for saving musical compositions and arrangements.
